snippet: In an open letter sent to The Los Angeles Times, Mr. Rose said he would not attend the event, and therefore there would be no reunion of the band's classic lineup.
abstract: In an open letter sent to The Los Angeles Times, Mr. Rose said he would not attend the event, and therefore there would be no reunion of the band's classic lineup.

headline.main: Axl Rose Publicly Declines Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Induction
headline.print_headline: Axl Rose Declines Rock Hall Induction
